name: Ysyry's Rite
description:
Game done made for Global Game Jam 2016. The keyword/theme for that year was "ritual" so we thought about transformation rituals, coming of age, finding who we are.  In this game Ysyry (Ysyry means "river" in Guaraní) goes on a quest to find their spirit animal. 

Controls and Goals

Jump with up-arrow (you can double jump). Find your spirit animal totems by going through the portals 

Tools And Technologies: 

Construct

Technology Notes: 

Sound was done in Logic Pro.

Credits: 

Felipe Nuñez Cassina - Game Design, Programming, Art

Julian Kopp - Game Design, Programming, Art

Esteban Sebastiani - Game Design, Music, Sound
